alert.note: Alert for Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Medina, southeastern Cuyahoga and northern Summit Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Macedonia to 8 miles southeast of Brunswick. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuyahoga Falls, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Macedonia, Stow, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Bedford, Bedford Heights, Independence, Northfield, Richfield, Reminderville, Silver Lake, Walton Hills, Valley View, Boston Heights, Glenwillow and Peninsula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
